content:
嗯，这是我第一次拿到照片/角色扮演此页，我对如何使用语言有点困惑，但我很高兴，从遥远的智利我的国家分享这一爱好。

否则，我试着尽我所能，并启动份额的人物之一的这张照片我最喜欢最终幻想，希望有一个雪对我笑 ! ( ╯°□°)╯♡

✿ ~ Version in english and in the original language of the page I'm not very good, sorry if it is not well written (use a translator XD).

Well this is the first time I get a picture / cosplay to this page, I'm a little confused on how to use the language, but I'm very happy to share this hobby from as far away as Chile my country.

Otherwise I try to do my best and to start share this picture of one of the characters I like best final fantasy, and hopefully have a snow for me lol ! ( ╯°□°)╯♡


Serah Farron cn: SyoHanami
